info.author: Jochen Schnelle
info.description:
pyHanoi is a Python module which uses an iterative approach to solve the "Towers of Hanoi" game.
But instead of running through the shortest possible solution, pyHanoi offers the option to stop the game after a defined move or a defined number of moves and to show the state of the game at this stage. After that, game can be continued.
pyHanoi works with Python 2.6, 2.7 and 3.
info.name: pyHanoi
info.summary: An interative solver for the Towers of Hanoi game
info.html_description: pyHanoi is a Python module which uses an iterative approach to solve the “Towers of Hanoi” game. But instead of running through the shortest possible solution, pyHanoi offers the option to stop the game after a defined move or a defined number of moves and to show the state of the game at this stage. After that, game can be continued. pyHanoi works with Python 2.6, 2.7 and 3.
